Html:
i have different markers with the same position on map.

i am able to group them by their position but i need to to show these different markers on the map also... i am looking a way to show in same custom or pre-made box...OR... is there way to do that?

thanks

please say how.

your are used to give very short answers.

what type of box can i use....some more help can be very usefull.

thanks

hi radioman,

I suppose that GMapTooltip is the standard tooltip for markers?

2nd:

for adding image to the tooltip do i just have to add image in OnRender(Graphics g)?

3rd:

is that also possible to show info in tooltip for more then one marker on the same position?

are my thoughts good? 

thanks in advance

yes, just render the image in your tooltip and it will be visible

..and i don't know about the 3rd ;/
thanks i will give it a try
